metatags.twitter:title: Can Biden win over Black voters who Clinton lost in 2016?
metatags.og:title: Can Biden win over Black voters who Clinton lost in 2016?
metatags.og:description: The Biden campaign’s recent slate of events around race and policing — equal parts listening tour and call to action — is part of a targeted effort to win over Black voters, one that started last year but now comes at a critical moment in the 2020 presidential election.

title: The year America confronted racism
snippet: Dec 14, 2020 ... 2020: The year America confronted racism. By Nicole Chavez, CNN. Americans were living through history in 2020 as the country was forced to ...
htmlSnippet: Dec 14, 2020 ... 2020: The year America confronted racism. By Nicole Chavez, CNN. Americans were living through history in 2020 as the country was forced to ...

metatags.og:title: The year America confronted racism
metatags.og:description: Year in review. As the Covid-19 pandemic ravaged the US, Black, Latino and Native Americans were among the hardest hit and Asians became the targets of racist attacks in 2020. The killings of George Floyd and others reignited the outcry that Black Lives Matter and thousands protested across the US.
metatags.twitter:creator: @cnn
